p: In the experiment, starting from a high pressure, it is gradually depressurized in the sapphire cell to observe physical changes through the glass window into the cell. Three different tests conducted: (1) Pressure and temperature search to find the opalescence of CO 2 existence conditions; (2) Characterization of CO 2 mixing with condensate gas; (3) Diffusion test of the system of condensate gas and SC-CO 2 with high temperature.
